title: Kyrie Irving Would Simply Retire if the Nets Were to Trade Him. Plus, a Potential Midseason Tournament. | Real Ones
description:
Logan and Raja are back talking about the potential for a midseason tournament and whether that would work in the NBA (0:30). Then they discuss Nick Wright’s reporting that Kyrie Irving would retire from the NBA if he were traded from the Nets (21:00) before Jomi joins to give his thoughts on the Clippers breaking ground on their new arena in Inglewood (33:50).
Hosts: Logan Murdock and Raja Bell
Guest: Jomi Adeniran
Associate Producer: Sasha Ashall
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
